name: Dimensional Balls
description:
This is my fist game.

Created using python and pygame

It was meant to be a learning "project" for me to know a bit of pygame. Decided to have a small scope as I only started with less than 29 hours left to start and complete the game. In the end, I probably spent about 6-8 hours creating te game (with a lot of youtube/stackoverflow/discord in between).

Music and sfx were generated by an auto-generator.  Font is from a free font by GrafxKid (itch.io)

Only available for Windows - Sorry, though if you have linux or mac and python/pygame installed, you should be able to run the Dimensions.py directly.

I'm really bad at playing games, so my max score so far is only 63. Let me know what you get up to :)

Thanks for commenting/voting on the game or source code. Any constructive feedback welcomed.
